column4: My ISP just announced that their hand has been forced by Bell Canada and the CRTC and that, come March, they'll be charging ridiculous overage fees. Can anyone point me to a guide to setting up a local apt-get cache for my LAN?
One of my PCs has several hundred gigs of free space, so I'd prefer to cache everything possible.
you wanna cache several hundred gigs?
I'm saying I have several hundred gigs free.
